title: The Exhibition of Achievements in Compiling A Comprehensive Collection of Ancient Chinese Paintings Opens in Hong Kong with Academic Symposium
desc: HONG KONG, Jan. 31, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- The Compilation of Classics in the Flourishing Age: Exhibition of Achievements in Compiling A Comprehensive Collection of Ancient Chinese Paintings is on display at the City University of Hong Kong (CityUHK) from January 15 to February 6. The exhibition is presented through an institutional collaboration led by the Information Office of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Government, the Zhejiang Provincial Department of Culture, Radio, Television and Tourism, Zhejiang University, and CityUHK, and is supported by the CityUHK Cultural Exchange Oasis and Zhejiang University Press.

title: Elena Rybakina wins Australian Open for 2nd Grand Slam title
desc: Elena Rybakina won the Australian Open title with a 6-4, 4-6, 6-4 victory over top-ranked Aryna Sabalenka that avenged her loss in the championship decider in 2023.

title: MCMC shuts down illegal transceiver station used to send scam messages
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) has detected and shut down an illegal base transceiver station in Genting Highlands, Pahang used for fraudulent purposes.
